thread.title: Brazzers' XXX Halftime Show Is The One You'll Want To Watch Sunday
thread.title_full: Brazzers' XXX Halftime Show Is The One You'll Want To Watch Sunday

author: Zach Paul
title: Brazzers' XXX Halftime Show Is The One You'll Want To Watch Sunday
text:
Brazzers Announces 'ZZ Halftime II' Performers Â© Brazzers Brazzers Announces 'ZZ Halftime II' Performers Trending News: Brazzers XXX Halftime Show Is The One You'll Want To Watch Sunday Shares Quick Take 
Competition will be fierce at this weekend's highly anticipated Super Bowl 51 . The Atlanta Falcons and their top-rated NFL offense will face off against the league's #1 defensive team, the New England Patriots. But thanks to the return of internet porn giant Brazzer's "ZZ Halftime" show , Lady Gaga has some competition herself. 
Brazzer's "ZZ Halftime II" promises several "wardrobe malfunctions" to say the least. Porn stars Phoenix Marie, Romi Rain, Brooklyn Chase and Veronica Avluv will compete against each other in NSFW football-themed games. In the official halftime show Lady Gaga plans to perform while suspended in mid-air , so either way you've got ladies going to great lengths to entertain you. 
Let's meet the competitors.
